explains: adj. 忧郁的；昏暗的；严峻的；阴天的

sentences.en: There were the two somber figures still following him, though their black sacks were drenched and dripping with water.
sentences.cn: 有两个阴森的人影仍跟在他后面，尽管他们的黑麻袋都湿透了，还在滴水。

sentences.en: Prime Minister Tony Blair was somber.
sentences.cn: 而英国首相布莱尔则是忧心忡忡。

sentences.en: In fact, he sounded somber and contrite.
sentences.cn: 事实上，他的声音听起来又沮丧又后悔。
